question: Which of the following represents vinegar?
option1: 20% solution of acetic acid in ethanol
option2: 20% solution of acetic acid in water
option3: 5-8% solution of acetic acid in water
option4: 40-50% solution of acetic acid in water
answer: 5-8% solution of acetic acid in water
explanation: 5-8% solution of acetic acid in water is called vinegar. It is used widely as a preservative in pickles. Acetic acid is the common name of Ethanoic acid.
